dk.itst.oiosaml.sp
Interface AuthenticationHandler

All Known Subinterfaces:
LogoutAuthenticationHandler
public interface AuthenticationHandler

Use this interface to receive notifications about user authentications.

Author:
Joakim Recht

Method Summary
 boolean userAuthenticated(UserAssertion assertion, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
          This method is called right after an assertion has been received and validated.
 

Method Detail

userAuthenticated

boolean userAuthenticated(UserAssertion assertion,
                          javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                          javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
This method is called right after an assertion has been received and validated. It will be called before the user is redirected to the page originally requested.

Throwing a runtime exception from this method will result in the default error page - refer to the oiosaml developer documentation on how to customize this.

Parameters:
assertion - The assertion received.
Returns:
Return false if processing should fail - ie the user should not be authenticated anyway. If false is returned, no state will be registered in the session, and processing will be aborted. Any information to the user should be written manually using the response object.
